position.title: Research Assistant
position.summary:
1. A Publication Search Engine for Korean Scholar
 
 Build up the academic search engine for Korean Researchers.
 Offer searching feature of the shortest powerful path between different scholars.

2. Sina Weibo Importer for NodeXL/ConText

 Write one Weibo (Chinese Twitter) extension for NodeXL and ConText
 Output user's ego friendship and communication networks from Weibo APIs.
 Automatically visualize result on NodeXL/ConText

position.title: Software Developer
position.summary:
Big Data Demo: use Storm to build up a real-time Big Data analytic platform.
- Collect real-time public stream tweets via Twitter API.
- Extract Hashtags, calculate terms and sentiment score for each Hashtag.
- Apply Redis and Spark to store data and build web applications.

position.title: Data Analyst
position.summary:
Healthcare Twitter Analysis
- Apply Data Science skills to social media to get insights about healthcare issues.
- Extracted hot topics from over 40,000 tweets and operate the sentiment analysis.
- Extracted physical symptoms to different diseases.
- Summarized suggested medicine to each of the specific diseases.

position.title: Software Developer
position.summary:
ASABE Robotic Competition: design Robots to pick up, haul, and then stack the hay bales within 5 minutes
- Design Robots Mechanical Structure to implement tasks
- Use Arduino to control Robot servos
- Real-time monitor Robot activity from computer and cellphone
- Won the runner-up award
